snippet: Andy Murray said he cried a few days after the Olympics, when the whole thing finally sank in. And any movie with Will Ferrell in it is O.K. by him.
abstract: Andy Murray said he cried a few days after the Olympics, when the whole thing finally sank in. And any movie with Will Ferrell in it is O.K. by him.

headline.main: Conversations With Andy Murray: Questions From Readers
headline.print_headline: You Can Pass Murray the Haggis, but Not the Newspaper
